title: Add favicon asset and wire it in HTML entry point

requirements.summary: Add a favicon static asset under frontend/public and reference it from the HTML entry point so browsers display the site icon.
acceptanceCriteria: A favicon file exists under frontend/public (for example: frontend/public/favicon.svg and/or frontend/public/favicon.ico).
frontend/index.html includes appropriate <link rel="icon" ...> tag(s) referencing the new favicon file(s).
When running the app in a browser, the tab icon shows the new favicon (no missing favicon 404 in devtools network panel).

file_operations.description: Add the generated favicon image asset (Simple flat monogram logo "ML" in a circular badge) as a static file to be served directly from frontend/public. This must be the exact file path/name required by imageRequirements.

Add appropriate favicon <link rel="icon" ...> tag(s) in the <head> referencing the static favicon image at frontend/public/assets/generated/favicon-ml-badge.dim_512x512.png so the browser loads it without 404s.
